activities: Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland: Canfield Scientific, Inc. provides digital imaging services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology and cosmetic industries to support clinical trials and healthcare professionals with their dermatological and other medical needs through the use of photographic hardware and software.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: Canfield Scientific, Inc. receives personal information from Member countries of EU/EEA/ Switzerland that includes customer/client data and clinical trial data. Personal data includes hard and digital copies including manually processed data.
recoursemech: eTRUST has been contracted to investigate unresolved complaints.
